comments.text: I have been buying their rice and curry for a while, and the food has always been delicious. They currently sell at 550, which is reasonable compared to other shops in the area. Only card payments are accepted.
Good place to hv non veg dinner.   Cost wise very worth.
There is a superb selection of rice, curries, sambols and of course appetizers.  In addition, there are mouthwatering desserts.
Food is good but expensive
Worst food. Ordered kottu. It smelled awful.

They have a delicious range of kottus like grilled chicken kottu and double egg omelet kottu, but they are best known for their signature beef kottu. Paring your kottu with a heavy milkshake is sure to make a filling meal. For desserts, BARS cafe has a yummy chocolate biscuit pudding, chocolate mousse, and more to choose from.
The Cheese Kotthu is a standout, arguably the best in Colombo.
However wasn t really happy with the kottu. It tasted really sour . Not sure if that s the quality they give at all times
kottu vas average
Don't have their masala kottu. They dump a ton of chilli that you can't eat it all

I had the worst experience ever, I ordered egg-fried rice from Bars cafe through pick me and while eating the food found a worm in the chop suey. And the rice was so soggy overall the experience was bad and I highly don't recommend this place.

Chicken Satay was most disappointing. It was like boiled pieces of chicken stuck on skewers.  Peanut sauce was as bad. Kindly refer to the photo posted under your site & what is being delivered just now. Very disappointing Bars! Get your standards quality controlled pleas

Just picked up 2 biriyani's based on the Google map Menu , price varied by a huge amount, could you kindly update. The boy answered saying it's correct but it wasn't. Please train your cashier to be courteous, I've also told him I have to make note of that. When I went to the counter he made a gesture, like mokkada from a little away from the counter! His attitude is off!
The worst biryani ever i taste.very disgusting taste
After 2 o clock PM , Don t try Briyani , they ll pump out anything. it usually good after some mindless waiter do this kind of things.
the place is unbeatable for it's biriyani. A generous portion of juicy chicken or whatever meat one prefers, a hard boiled egg and several spicy sambals accompany a huge portion of the spicy rice.
This was incredibly disappointing and raised serious hygiene concerns. I urge others to be cautious if dining here.
The food was exceptionally delicious, and I highly recommend trying the following items
Recommended dishes
Very disappointing. The kotthu was dry and didn't have much taste. Not enough vegetables, it was mostly just cabbage and chilli.
Sent without chicken and the taste is far below compared to the price. Not expected from a reputed named shop. Not recommended for anyone. Pathetic and no customer service at all,very shameful !
Mr.Kottu, your service is the worst to ultra terrible.
Good place, Good food and most importantly Good service.
So it is really delicious and reasonable for all.
Not bad but bit overpriced
Kottu is very average. Its good, but not very good. Definitely not worth the money.
Tasty and worth the price, but crowded at night.
The cheese and egg rotti was crispy buttery and tasty
he kottu was amazing mainly the cheese kottu
Mr.Kottu, your service is the worst to ultra terrible.
We had a cheese koththu and a nasi goreng. Portion was enough for two and tasty, well served. Highly recommend this place for anyone around.
Worst Kottu I had in recent time.
Worst Chicken kottu I have ever had. Not worth for price.
Cheese Kottu is like eating thambapu kos or ????. Terrible. Waste of money.
people expect something more! This is not even close to Koththu!
Great place for a hangout. Food was good
The food was exceptionally delicious, and I highly recommend trying the following items
We had a cheese koththu and a nasi goreng. Portion was enough for two and tasty, well served. Highly recommend this place for anyone around.
Prices are definitely on the higher side
Not recommend.
These places dont look alike as seen in videos.
masala kottu is amazing
When we went in, no body will ask what we need. We went to the counter and ordered Masala Kottu, which they are famous. It was extremely spice we could not eat
Great calm atmosphere with some exceptional food
The WORST pasta in town! Horrible food.
That was probably among the worst sushi we've had in Colombo!
The prawns were slightly overcooked. Nice displays of seafood but execution was quite poor.
It had the consistency of a thick soup with no taste of potatoes. I could only have one spoon of it.
That hot butter cuttlefish dish is very nice option to try.It's so good.
From prawns that danced on my tongue to fish so fresh it swam free in my mind, this place reeled me in. Crabs cracked & lobsters steamed, all perfection. A feast for the sense
The sushi was rubbish with overcooked rice.
For a 1st time trial, we really didn't like it much , the taste was too pungent, The service was good and staffs are friendly but food quality was a question.
That everything tasted great and the service was helpful and friendly
The milk coffee especially tasted amazing. Prices were very reasonable although do be aware that they asked us for a tip when we were leaving
We loved its avocado juice. Well blended
The mango sticky rice was a letdown.The mago wasn't ripe and sweet.
They cook seafood really well. The prawns and crispy squid were so tender.
It's iconic. So creamy and milo-y. 600 or so for 2 scoops +some milo powder. I split it with my partner. Worth it.
it was good but the hoisin sauce was mixed with soy sauce so was salty.
The dishes we got were all very good, the only disappointment was the papaya salad. It was very SWEET :-O ! I have eaten in many Thai restaurants and have never had sweet papaya salad.
Papaya salad was tasty,they could have had some more tomatoes & peanuts to really make it pop. The chefs made it a perfect level of spicy ness which l appreciate.
The cocktails were great - recommend the chilli pineapple Margarita, and the Gimlet.
Chef's special mutton curry is highly recommended. Literally melts in your mouth.
I love their Pistachio Kulfi, which was an amazing.
the naan was the best from everything everything. Naan with that butter just melt down in your mouth. Really enjoyed the food.
Heavily disappointed by the amount of chicken that was in the Dum- Biriyani.Sadly they ve reduced the amount of chicken pieces and increased the prices as well.
Specially chicken biryani is good with authentic biriyani flavor and also comes with good moisture.
Tried Pani Puri but it is comparatively an average snack here in terms of taste and the presentation. It is not that crispy.
Their brownies taste just no where less than perfect!
It was excellent..the fish was crispy and it went well with the Biriyani rice which was also really tasty.
Had Thalapath Fish curry with egg hoppers. Tasty, wholesome and surprisingly was suffient for me alone. Found some sweetness in their hoppers, which is why it tastes good.

I was quite disappointed with the crab curry I ordered. It seemed more like crab soup, with tiny minced crab pieces, and the taste left much to be desired. Nothing even close to the great Jaffna crab curry taste.
The jaggery and milk hoppers were out of this world.Iy was so good.
Their complimentary papadam and delightful rasam soup set the stage for a remarkable dining experience.
Their Hoppers were excellent.. it makes my mouth water just thinking of the food.
Used to be the place I went for good hoppers and quality Jafna food. The hoppers were cold and made with some grainy batter.
This is not a odiyal kool tests , it s tastes like a sweet sauce, sugar, very disappointed
There garlic curry was NOT what I expected so water and tasteless.
We ordered only a modest meal but the star was undoubtedly the fried fish puttu, which was very finely made and delicious
Definitely get the garlic shrimp, we ordered it multiple times

My first bite was the fries and immediately I knew that these were amongst the best fries I have ever had. Really. The perfect thickness, carefully fried, lightly salted and with a rich flavor (and aroma) of potato
My only critique would be that the spaghetti bolognese didn't quite meet my expectations.
The real downer was the lemon meringue pie. The meringue had this egg taste which is intrusive and really makes it hard to enjoy the slice. Stomachiing it was difficult.
We really didn t enjoy the pineapple margarita, it was a thick frozen slushy with a strange flavour, rather than a crisp classic margatita.
I would recommend you to start off with the Tom Yum soup a good first impression to stay off with!
The tofu pieces were huge and weren't presented well. It seemed as if they didn't care for the presentation of the food. All dishes lacked authentic flavors.
The shared fried rice was well worth the money
The chicken satay was so yummy and the food overall was delicious.
The chicken fried rice was very flavorful and the chicken was cooked perfectly.
The butterfly pea drink was not only visually stunning but also incredibly refreshing.
The herbal blue fried rice was unique and flavorful.
That was the worst ever for a restaurant of this tier. Do not order the juices. Just water will do fine as all the juices taste the same as water. Was very disappointed with this.
These guys have wrapped the chicken chapati wrap in a soft paper where it has been smudged due to heavy rain. If u can't do proper packaging please do not do delivery during rain.
Today I ordered a submarine from Paan Paan and I am impressed with the quality and the taste.

My meal was a submarine with grilled vegetables and feta cheese. The feta was invisible! Absolutely no feta cheese! If you can't supply the customer with the specified order,  then notify them or cancel. Very disappointing.
it s good for drunken person ..hot and spicy means a lot for the word..also no chicken at all....chicken crushed and cut in to pieces and not visible or cannot taste ..Just simply waste of money ..
Love their sandwiches, specially the smoked beef.
The submarines got too many seeds on the bread many avoid the brown bread.I'm not satisfied with that submarine.
Ordered some sandwiches from this cafe, they were good. They included a variety of flavours.
The sandwich was made fresh to order. I would definitely recommend Paan Paan to anyone looking for delicious and satisfying sandwiches in the area.
Ordered a BBQ Chicken sandwich from paan paan, the taste and the quality is just awesome. The packaging is also good.
The cutlet filling is full of potatoes,  I don't see any fish taste while eating
Their BBQ submarine is my personal favorite.It's super tasty and the flavors are just amazing.
The worst was the Cinnamon Roll. Never try them out. Needs lot of improvement on food.
All these 5 - 6 years, I stick with the Tasmania Salmon, don t know how they do that! The taste didn t change at all, so good!
The quality of the meat was not great.The steak also had no crust and was not cooked in enough fat.
It is difficult to find a good steak in Colombo and this is one of the best ones.It's so yummy.
I don't know if it was because the seasoning was strong or if it was the pepper sauce itself, but it was a bit too salty to eat.
The chicken mouse was tasteless.So dissapointed with that.
Best steak in town. Ordered a medium rare rib eye steak and it was delicious
The Bush Lamb is not worth the price. The portion was too small for the price charged for it.
